name: Taberna del Alabardero Madrid - Restaurante Palacio Real

reviews.text: Just perfect. Authentic Spanish experience. The food is delicious, the wine great too, and the service friendly by real pros who care about their profession and traditions. We ate tapas standing at the bar, and were the only tourists in the whole restaurant (non-Spanish ones anyway!) Very reasonable prices for the quality.

Some reviews say the ox tail has no flavour. Definitely not the case. It‚Äôs definitely subtle but very flavourful. Favourite dish for my Fianc√©. The baby cuttlefish was my favourite. Good service and good atmosphere.

If you are looking for authentic Spanish dishes, this is a good place to go to. We stumbled on this place by luck, and we were pleasantly surprised with how amazing all the food was, so much so that we wanted to go back... Definitely recommend!!!

Me encanto el restaurante üòçüòç.
Every time I go to Madrid I always try to book a table here to enjoy the foods. It‚Äôs incredible and I love it very much. But it seems not easy to book a table here. Yesterday I had a perfect lunch and today I want to come back but cannot book a table because it‚Äôs always busy üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠. So sad.

We ate here twice during our stay in Madrid. It is an absolutely incredible place to eat. The food is amazing and the service is equal. Alfonso was with us for four hours of experience and, by the end, felt like familia. The manager was also very attentive and the entire time we were enjoying conversation, drink, food, and more. I can‚Äôt wait to come back to Madrid and eat here once again.
